meanings.definition: Not having occurred or taken place.
meanings.sent1: The unhappened party was canceled due to bad weather.
meanings.sent2: The unhappened event left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent3: The unhappened picnic would have been so much fun.
meanings.sent4: Her unhappened birthday celebration felt like a missed opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The unhappened fireworks display was a letdown for the crowd.

meanings.definition: To fail to happen or come to pass.
meanings.sent1: The planned trip unhappened due to unforeseen circumstances.
meanings.sent2: I hope the meeting doesn't unhappen because of a scheduling conflict.
meanings.sent3: It would be quite a surprise if the party unhappened at the last minute.
meanings.sent4: She feared her dreams would unhappen before they even began.
meanings.sent5: The magic show seemed to unhappen before our very eyes.
